DOC.brief_summary: Objective : evaluate efficacy American College Physicians Foundation ( ACPF ) Diabetes Guide ( Living Diabetes : An Everyday Guide You Your Family ) improve diabetes self-management . Study Sites : Nine Federally-qualified health center safety-net clinic three site Missouri . Sites urban ( St. Louis ) , midsize ( Columbia ) rural ( Kirksville ) . Three FQHCs safety net clinic locate site . Methods Overview Design : A randomized control trial conduct . Patients recruit identified health center . As intervention direct clinic patient , clinic randomly assign either 1 ) usual care ( treatment ) , 2 ) `` Carve-In '' - patient receive Diabetes Guide clinic staff follow-up work patient create complete action plan 3 ) '' Carve-Out '' - patient receive Diabetes Guide diabetes educator Chicago follow work patient create complete action plan . Recruited subject administer baseline assessment , 3-month 1-year follow-up assessment . Sample : The investigator recruit total 1,080 patient ( n=120 per clinic ) anticipate 80 percent retention follow-up assessment ( final estimate number patient = 720 ) . Eligibility participate define patient 1 ) age 30 older ( well represent disease distribution ) , 2 ) English Spanish-speaking , 3 ) confirm ( chart ) diagnosis uncontrolled diabetes ( HBA1c 7.0 ) .
